com.crawljax.condition.browserwaiter

Class WaitCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.condition.browserwaiter.WaitCondition

  • @ThreadSafe
public class WaitCondition
extends Object
    Defines a wait condition for an url. A waitcondition has a list of expected conditions which should all be satisfied for the specified url.
    Author:
    dannyroest@gmail.com (Danny Roest)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitCondition(String url, ExpectedCondition... expectedConditions) 
      WaitCondition(String url, int timeoutMilliseconds, ExpectedCondition... expectedConditions) 
      WaitCondition(String url, int timeoutMilliseconds, List<ExpectedCondition> expectedConditions) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected String getUrl() 
      int testAndWait(EmbeddedBrowser browser)

    • Method Detail

      • testAndWait

        public int testAndWait(EmbeddedBrowser browser)
        Tests all the conditions and waits for them to be satisfied or times out.
        Parameters:
        browser - The browser to use.
        Returns:
        -1 if browser does not match url. 0 by timeout. 1 if all conditions are satisfied

        protected String getUrl()
        Returns:
        the url
